title: where is yaso's chest
body: anyone know where is yaso's chest???

replies.body: Players who obtain Project Yasuo before the end of the project disruption event will earn the First Strike border.  Meaning, it won't be necessary to have a chest  to unlock it.  We have this piece included in our recently crafted [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ#h4) guide.  Hope that helps!
